messages.title: BUILDING A STRONGER ECONOMY IN A FAIRER SOCIETY
messages.content: NHS Funding: Lib Dems only party to make commitment

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to commit the extra £8 billion a year the NHS needs to maintain good quality services.
Improvements have been made in the last few years. If elected as an MP, work to accelerate this.
Ensuring Oxford finally has the powers necessary to alleviate the City's housing crisis and improve its creaking infrastructure.

mentions.candidate: Alasdair Murray will 'go full pelt to provide the excellent local service you deserve'.

issues.education: Improvements in the education system in Oxford East.

housing.content: Alleviate the City's housing crisis and improve its creaking infrastructure.

quotes.text: Labour and Tories refuse to commit to doctors' £8bn NHS funding plea
